# UIScrollView.IndexDisplayMode.automatic

**Case**

The index is displayed or hidden automatically.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Constants

- **UIScrollView.IndexDisplayMode.alwaysHidden**: The index is never displayed.
